name: Circ (BTABray)
description:
Meet Circ! Circ's a circle. You can interact with him in ways, like moving him around. 

Thanks for playing!Now, here are the controls:
  1. P to start moving mode (move circ) 
  2. O to stop moving mode. 
  3. S to switch to strawberry BG 
  4. L to switch to lime BG 
  5. K to end 
  6. M to mute music 
  7. U to unmute music
v

THIS GAME WAS ORIGINALLY CREATED IN SCRATCH.  IF YOU SEE ANYTHING THAT RELATES TO CLICKING A GREEN FLAG OR "RESTARTING A PROJECT", RELOAD THE PAGE.
